meanings.definition: A person who is opposed to communism.
meanings.sent1: The anticommunist spoke passionately against communism at the rally.
meanings.sent2: She is known in the community as a dedicated anticommunist.
meanings.sent3: The anticommunist and the communist had a friendly debate over coffee.
meanings.sent4: In the movie, the hero was portrayed as an anticommunist fighting for freedom.
meanings.sent5: Growing up, his grandfather shared stories of being an anticommunist during the war.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of opposition to communism.
meanings.sent1: The anticommunist group organized a protest against the communist regime.
meanings.sent2: Her anticommunist views were well-known among her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The anticommunist cat refused to share the same bed with the communist dog.
meanings.sent4: The anticommunist sentiment spread rapidly throughout the country.
meanings.sent5: The anticommunist propaganda posters were plastered all over the city.
